title: Stress Regulation via Surface Micro-etching and Reconstruction for Enhancing Triple-Cation Perovskite Solar Cells with the Efficiency of 25.54%
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE04248D, Paper
Yang Ding, Erming Feng, Siyuan Lu, Jianhui Chang, Caoyu Long, S.C. Tong, Hengyue Li, Junliang Yang
Residual stresses generated within perovskite films during the high-temperature annealing and cooling process are the key contributors to reduce device performance and lifespan deterioration. Herein, a strategy of surface micro-etching...
